speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is John from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi John, I'm doing alright, how can I help you?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Before we proceed, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thanks for confirming your information. You have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half of that amount right now.

speaker: Agent
text: That's perfectly fine. So, would you like to pay $125 today?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I will process your payment. Can you please provide your payment method?

speaker: Customer
text: I will use my credit card for that.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your cooperation. I’ll take care of that right away.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you, John! Have a good day.
